register_account.success: Check your inbox for confirmation email and follow instructions to finish account registration.

reset_password.success: An email has been sent to your email to reset your password.

confirm_account.unexpected_error: Unexpected error occurred, please contact support

import_file.title: Import file
import_file.file_error_select: Please select a file to proceed with upload
import_file.processing_error: Application encountered an unexpected error while processing your file {{fileName}}. Please, try again and if error continues to occur, contact system admin.

library.title: Library
library.delete_description: This action will permanently delete this document and all collation progress made within.

witness_list.title: Witness list
witness_list.delete_description: This action will permanently delete this witness and all token variants for this witness.

project.title: Project: {{mode}}
project.no_tokens_message: Your project does not have any tokens yet.
project.no_significant_variants_message: Your project does not have any significant variants. To see them, you need to make a decision for one of the available tokens.
project.no_insignificant_variants_message: Your project does not have any insignificant variants. To see them, you need to make a decision for one of the available tokens.
project.no_token_error: Please select a token valid for variant selection
project.before_create_title: Click existing token to split it or create new token
project.before_create_description: Tokens can only be created by combining adjacent words (and existing tokens) separated by space.
project.token_before_create_warning: This action will permanently delete any variants selections, editorial remarks or comments connected to any of the selected tokens.
project.select_token: Please select a token to perform variant selection
project.select_comment: Please select a token to perform comment selection
project.edit_token_variant_submit: You edited the variants successfully, previous selections for the token were removed, please select the correct reading again
project.editorial_remark_error: Failed to fetch editorial remark types
project.too_many_tokens_error: Selected too many tokens with multiple variants. Maximum allowed is 1
project.same_token_error: Cannot split a token with multiple variants
project.select_token_button_text: Select text to create a new token
project.split_token_info_text: Splitting operation needs to be performed for all witnesses before saving.
project.token_before_split_warning: This action will permanently delete any variants selections, editorial remarks or comments connected to the selected token.

add_witness.add_witness_message: Your witness witness {{name}}, {{siglum}} has been successfully added to project {{projectName}}. You can change the variants for this witness in the project Edit mode.
